title: 关于自定义村民交换的问题
author: 白色的麋鹿
txt_content:

/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Profession:1,
CustomName:"买买提",CustomNameVisible:1,
Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:100}],
Offers:{Recipes:[
{maxUses:9999999,
buy:{id:10,Count:1,Damage:1},

{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:3.1415926,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},
